description: The Fleeing Hare is a small, nimble creature that relies on its speed and agility to escape predators. Its fur is a mottled brown and white, allowing it to blend in with its surroundings. Despite its size, the Fleeing Hare is incredibly perceptive and can sense danger from afar.

traits.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
traits.description: The Fleeing Hare has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

traits.name: Nimble Escape
traits.description: The Fleeing Hare can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +0 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 (1d4 - 2) piercing damage.
